豐富左你既知識，到有新既area/topic你都可以借鑑以前既方法去propose新既solution解決新既問題
research切忌一開始就jump to conclusion
每一個步驟都應該細心分析
點解有呢個問題，呢個問題係做咩，解決左呢個問題有咩用，有咩可能既方法去解決呢個問題

https://m.bilibili.com/video/av84385561

Graph ML 分兩大派，spatial 同spectral
Spatial 主要係由Word2vec 既skipgram 延伸出黎，將d graph 既node 當係word，然後行random walk，再fit 入skipgram 去做embeddings
近既node 就會map 去接近既euclidean space 到（node embeddings）

spectral 就主要環繞spectral graph theory
睇住laplacian matrix 同Rayleigh Quotient
然後用eigenvalue 去做嘢

我最近都做緊啲關於graph嘅嘢 愈睇愈有趣 我呢排個task係想用algorithm 去appoximate返個time series data 嘅direct acyclic graph出嚟去睇features之前嘅causation

另外graphical models真係大有用途 除咗clustering之外 仲可以做好多嘢 以前岩岩學ML 就會好focus喺DL models, 其實PGM, spectral graph 嗰啲都好impressive 睇得多咗graphical models再睇返DL會有好唔同嘅感悟

睇完呢個course 你會有d idea （支那網bilibili ）
https://m.bilibili.com/video/av84385561

Graph ML 分兩大派，spatial 同spectral
Spatial 主要係由Word2vec 既skipgram 延伸出黎，將d graph 既node 當係word，然後行random walk，再fit 入skipgram 去做embeddings
近既node 就會map 去接近既euclidean space 到（node embeddings）

spectral 就主要環繞spectral graph theory
睇住laplacian matrix 同Rayleigh Quotient
然後用eigenvalue 去做嘢

我最近都做緊啲關於graph嘅嘢 愈睇愈有趣 我呢排個task係想用algorithm 去appoximate返個time series data 嘅direct acyclic graph出嚟去睇features之前嘅causation

另外graphical models真係大有用途 除咗clustering之外 仲可以做好多嘢 以前岩岩學ML 就會好focus喺DL models, 其實PGM, spectral graph 嗰啲都好impressive 睇得多咗graphical models再睇返DL會有好唔同嘅感悟

但Spectral graph theory 通常要求undirected graph 因為Symmetric matrix）
Ching 知唔知將佢extend 到directed graph 要用d 咩tools / theory

UG -> MSc (1年full time) -> 理科PhD (3年)

PhD 啱啱畢業 有5份first author publication係grade A journals

其實想講番除左讀MPhil外 可能都有另一個選擇就係MSc揀dissertation，而份dissertation要同之後PhD嘅topic有關

但前提係你要UG 做FYP嗰陣已經要留意邊個prof作風好同埋你有興趣佢嘅topic 我本身就係FYP嗰陣有D興趣 跟著直接同prof講想以後讀PhD 佢就話可以做住一年research assistant或者讀一年MSc

本身都覺得讀MSc好蠢 又曬錢又積累唔到research嘅技巧 但其實有某D大學係可以俾你MSc揀dissertation黎做 topic要同之後PhD嘅有D關係 就可以同大學申請講Msc呢一年都當做埋PhD咁

就係因為咁 PhD本身需要4年嘅 而家我就係1年MSc加3年PhD就讀完

咁樣其實係time cost最少 又可以退可守進可攻嘅方法

［利申：未必間間大學或者個個department都有方法 有興趣可以問番自己department嘅office或者prof］

其實想講番除左讀MPhil外 可能都有另一個選擇就係MSc揀dissertation，而份dissertation要同之後PhD嘅topic有關

但前提係你要UG 做FYP嗰陣已經要留意邊個prof作風好同埋你有興趣佢嘅topic 我本身就係FYP嗰陣有D興趣 跟著直接同prof講想以後讀PhD 佢就話可以做住一年research assistant或者讀一年MSc

咁樣其實係time cost最少 又可以退可守進可攻嘅方法

［利申：未必間間大學或者個個department都有方法 有興趣可以問番自己department嘅office或者prof］

replies.msg:
薄扶林 is a dead place. Your boss just pushes you to publish like you are a printer, not a human being. And all other jobs like tutorials, marking, ghost writing and fund application...The thing is you are reporting ONLY to your boss, which creates a situation of straight power relation. You will be heavily exploited in whatever form. Of course this depends on your boss's personality but nowadays most of the supervisors act like slave owners.

And if you, as an educated person, are explicit in supporting democracy, freedom of speech and human rights, which you think is an axiomatic civil obligation, you won't have many friends among peers.
